creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: two boat attendants rest, one standing, one squatting, at front of a large, flat bottomed boat at the shore; they watch as groups of travelers disembark on boats just across the black sandy embankment; two layers of grey tree lines in the distance at UL
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar center R edge; URQ
title: Mitsuke, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
